title: Anthony Scaramucci on Joe Biden & Pardons
itunes:title: Anthony Scaramucci on Joe Biden & Pardons
description:
Kevin spoke with Anthony Scaramucci, Former WH Communications Director and Founder of Skybridge Capital & Deidre Ball, Co-host of Mooch and the Mrs. podcast. They discussed the 2020 elections, allegations against Joe Biden, Stephen Moore, and Michael Cohen and Paul Manfort pardons.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin spoke with Anthony Scaramucci, Former WH Communications Director and Founder of Skybridge Capital & Deidre Ball, Co-host of Mooch and the Mrs. podcast. They discussed the 2020 elections, allegations against Joe Biden, Stephen Moore, and Michael Cohen and Paul Manfort pardons.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
